reviews.Content: It is my pleasure to write this review (and I don't usually write reviews!). I recently used Franck for a project at my home, and I am proud to say that it was a fantastic choice. He is an excellent, HIGHLY CREATIVE and technically sound architect and, no less important, a people person through and through. He was able to take a modest space with seemingly limited options and transform it into a bright, airy office that far exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend him and in fact will use no one else in the future.

Best architect that i know i really advise to take him. Not Only because i fought already 2 wars next to him but also because he is very professional. Even a destroyed house in gaza, he made it convenient and nice.

I am happy to highly recommend Frank. Throughout the process, Frank demonstrated professionalism, creativity, and a rare ability to understand our needs and desires, and translate them into precise, functional, and inspiring architectural planning. The combination of an innovative design vision and attention to detail makes working with him an extraordinary experience. Frank is always attentive, patient, available for questions, and accompanies the process with a calm and confidence that provides a sense of stability and safety. The final result not only met all expectations but also exceeded them â€“ a carefully designed home, tailored to our personal needs, pleasant to live in, and of high aesthetic value.

I had the pleasure of meeting the Haddad team, a professional and high-quality team that thinks about the smallest details. They were with us throughout the entire process and were always available for any questions and answers. There is no doubt that I will continue to work with them on the next project!

Frankie knows how to plan accurately. He connects with the structure, the walls, understands what the story is. At the same time, he directs and listens to his clients. Only then does he embark on precise planning. He has a peace and calm that illuminates the experience. And of course, he lets you feel the Zionism within him every step of the way.
